text.more:
Network visualization of 2023 People's Choice Top Games With Two created by Dr_Bewd.

You can use the search bar to search for a specific game. For the best experience, it is recommended to view this page on computer. When you click on a game's node, you'll automatically visualize a subset of the network with some game-specific information.

Games: All games that received at least 1 vote appear here.

Modularity class: This defines groups of games clustered together using the Modularity Optimization Algorithm for community detection. The games with a given color tend to be more densly connected to other games of that color.

score_f: This is the total score reached by the game in this year's voting. The size of each node is scaled using this value.

Eigenvector Centrality: A Measure telling you how well-connected a node is. The closer it is to 1, the more frequently a game appears on lists containing other well-connected games.

Connections: This is a list of games that appeard on a user's list together with the game that you're looking at at least 2 times. Please, note that this year there were only 120 voters so this is more of a proof of concept.
